FOOD & DRINK

We are really pleased to have secured local companies to provide food and drink throughout the day for people to purchase.

DRINKS

We are thrilled to have the SLOE DRINKS company coming along to run a licenced bar. They are a Hastings based company that work with local producers of gins, rums, craft beers and sparkling wines from across Sussex and Kent. Alongside their main drinks menu we will be choosing a local produced beer and cider especially for Hoodstock.

Find out more about SLOE DRINKS Mobile Bar Service

FOOD

When working with FTB parties we asked them for recommendations for a hog roast and Adam at Precision Catering was a hands down first! From Etchingham he specialises in hog-roasts alongside high-end private catering.

Adam will be selling freshly made Hog Roast baps (£8 adults / £5 kids) as well as kids sausage baps on the day. He will be creating a special mushroom /avocado chimichurri bap for those non-meat eaters. Please make sure you let us know when you register if you would prefer a veggie/vegan option so we know how much to prepare.

We have also arranged a visit from Hastings based Ace ice-cream van. They will be popping along between 5pm and 6pm with their van full of delights for kids and ice-cream-loving grown-ups!

ALL VENDORS WILL ACCEPT CASH & CARD PAYMENTS

Please note: In line with our licence agreement all drinks must be purchased from the licenced bar. Please do not bring any drinks with you apart from children’s drinks cups.

HOODSTOCK is a private, not for profit event. All attendees must register via Eventbrite. Questions? Email contact@hoodstock.rocks.
